mean.description: The arithmetic mean of the property values.

median.description: The median of the property values.

standardDeviation.description: The standard deviation of the property values.

variance.description: The variance of the property values.

sum.description: The sum of the property values.

occurrences.description: A dictionary, where each key corresponds to an enum `name` and each value is the number of occurrences of that enum. Only applicable when `type` or `componentType` is `ENUM`. For fixed-length arrays, this is an array with `componentCount` number of elements.
